title: Velazquez
brief_description: Gives historical background and critical evaluation of some of Velazquez major works. Shows some of his religious paintings; court portraits of Phillip IV and members of the Spanish Royal Family; informal poses of Cardinal Infante Fernando, Prince Baltasar Carlos as well as jesters of the Royal Court. Photographed at the Prado Museum, Madrid.
